items.name: Bombay Spl. Platter
items.description: A special platter featuring a variety of grilled meats and seafood, showcasing the best of Bombay's tandoori cuisine.

items.name: Tikka Platter
items.description: An assortment of succulent tikka preparations, marinated in aromatic spices and grilled to perfection.

items.name: Bombay Spl. Tandoori
items.description: Our signature tandoori chicken, marinated in a special blend of spices and cooked in a traditional clay oven.

items.name: Schezwan Tandoori
items.description: Tandoori chicken with a fiery Schezwan twist, combining the best of Indian and Chinese flavors.

items.name: Chicken Tandoori
items.description: Classic tandoori chicken, marinated in yogurt and a medley of spices, a timeless favorite.

items.name: Lemon Tandoori
items.description: Tandoori chicken infused with the zesty flavor of lemon, a refreshing and tangy delight.

items.name: Afghani Tandoori
items.description: Creamy and mildly spiced tandoori chicken, prepared with a rich blend of cashews and cream.

items.name: Makhmali Tandoori
items.description: Velvety smooth tandoori chicken, marinated in a delicate mixture of cheese and cream.

items.name: Special Malai Drum
items.description: Tender chicken drumsticks marinated in a rich and creamy blend of spices.

items.name: Chicken Barra
items.description: Succulent chicken barra, marinated in a robust blend of spices and grilled to perfection.

items.name: Chicken Peshawari Barra
items.description: Chicken barra with a Peshawari influence, featuring a unique blend of aromatic spices.

items.name: Chicken Variety Platter
items.description: A variety of chicken tikka and seekh kebab preparations, each with its own distinct flavor profile.

items.name: Tandoori Leg
items.description: A single chicken leg, marinated in tandoori spices and cooked in a clay oven.

items.name: Chicken Achari Kebab (6 Pcs)
items.description: Chicken kebabs infused with the tangy flavor of Indian pickles (achari).

items.name: Chicken Pudina Kebab (6 Pcs)
items.description: Chicken kebabs flavored with fresh mint (pudina), a refreshing and aromatic delight.

items.name: Chicken Banjara Kebab (6 Pcs)
items.description: Chicken kebabs prepared with a rustic blend of spices, reminiscent of the Banjara region.

items.name: Chicken Nawabi Kebab (6 Pcs)
items.description: Royal chicken kebabs, prepared with rich spices and a touch of elegance.

items.name: Mutton Chaap Tandoori (3 Pcs)
items.description: Tender mutton chops marinated in tandoori spices and cooked in a clay oven.

items.name: Mutton Barra (4 Pcs)
items.description: Succulent mutton barra, marinated in a robust blend of spices and grilled to perfection.

items.name: Mutton Turkey Boti (6 Pcs)
items.description: Boneless pieces of mutton, marinated in a blend of Turkish-inspired spices.

items.name: Mutton Seekh (4 Pcs)
items.description: Minced mutton kebabs, skewered and grilled to perfection.

items.name: Prawns Tikka
items.description: Plump prawns marinated in a vibrant blend of spices and grilled to perfection.

items.name: Paneer Tikka
items.description: Cubes of paneer marinated in a spiced yogurt mixture and grilled in a tandoor.

items.name: Prawns Fry
items.description: Fresh prawns, lightly battered and fried to golden perfection.

items.name: Rawas Fry
items.description: Slices of rawas fish, marinated and shallow fried.

items.name: Chicken Lasooni
items.description: Chicken cooked with a strong flavor of garlic.

items.name: Chicken Lalmirch
items.description: Chicken dish made with red chili.

items.name: Chicken Dry Fruit
items.description: Chicken cooked with a variety of dry fruits.

items.name: Dal Khichdi
items.description: A simple lentil and rice dish.

items.name: Dal Fry
items.description: Lentils cooked and tempered with spices.

items.name: Dal Tadka
items.description: Lentils cooked and tempered with spiced oil.

items.name: Mix Katakat
items.description: A Tawa preparation of bheja (brain), gurda (kidney), and kaleji (liver).

items.name: Double Bheja Masala
items.description: A rich preparation of bheja (brain) cooked with spices.

items.name: Bheja Masala
items.description: Brain cooked with a blend of spices.

items.name: Bheja Gurda Masala
items.description: Brain and kidney cooked together in a spicy masala.

items.name: Bheja Kaleji Masala
items.description: Brain and liver cooked in a spicy masala.

items.name: Gurda Kaleji Masala
items.description: Kidney and liver cooked in a spicy masala.

items.name: Kaleji Masala
items.description: Liver cooked with a blend of spices.

items.name: Gurda Masala
items.description: Kidney cooked with a blend of spices.

items.name: Rawas Tawa Masala
items.description: Indian salmon in spiced tawa gravy

items.name: Rawas Khada Masala
items.description: Salmon with whole spices in gravy

items.name: Prawns Tawa Masala
items.description: Jumbo prawns in spicy tawa gravy

items.name: Matar Mushroom Masala
items.description: Peas and mushrooms in spicy gravy

items.description: Cottage cheese in choice of sauce
